column4: Since switching to Ubuntu, my internet transfers have been *EXTREMELY* slow
Does Ubuntu need special drivers?
It's borderline unusable
A router never needs drivers, with any OS
where?
Gigabyte don't make intertube cards.
Please can you, on the Ubuntu box, open a terminal, and type: lspci
realtek semiconductor
now what?
I need everything, not just the manufacturer name.
there you go
and now?
A tshark trace would be very helpful.
no
it's gonna take 40 megs to download
with the current connection, that'll take a week
OK, I'll give you a direct link to the package
What kind of ping results do you get from google.com?
Please ping google.com, and give me some latency times?
Also, we are not being paid to make Ubuntu. We are not being paid to support Ubuntu.
One second
http://linux.oneandoneis2.org/LNW.htm
You don't like our work? Don't use it.
